is facing many difficulties, leading to a

recognition.  In the past, in Kien
Giang province, on each trip, Mr. Son
Thu bought nearly 500 tons of seafood, now there are
only about 150 to 170 tons left. 5 6 years
from now, my fish will be gone for the rest of my life. I and I are going on
a boat, but later on, my children will come.  When I grow
up, I don't know how big the fish is,
because the mandarins are dry. According to statistics
from Kien Giang province, the fishery output
exploited in the past 11 months has decreased by
more than 13 minutes compared to the same period last year. The
exploitation is ineffective.  Due to high fuel costs and
lack of workers, the number of
boats going out to sea to catch is decreasing,
while the
province's aquaculture output increased by more than 14 minutes compared to the same
period last year, with a harvest of more than 336,000 tons.
Recommendations to overcome

On December 1, the representative of the
Provincial Youth Union of Vinh Long province awarded the
brave youth badge of China.  The Youth Union leader gave
Tran Hoang the throne. Previously, during the
process of arresting illegal fishing boats
on the Hau River, the Youth Union leader was injured and
lost both legs.
Provincial Youth Union Secretary Tran Cong Khanh
asked about his health and gave him a gift.  The first
round of support was 369 million VND.
This amount was mobilized from youth organizations
inside and outside the province. Before that, on the evening of
November 23, Great Commissar Tran Hoang and three
teammates performed the task of patrolling the
Hau River.  In the water area of ​​Tra On district,
the force discovered two
people on an unmarked wooden boat that were
illegally mining sand
on the river. The patrol team ordered an
inspection, but these people did
not do so.  fled and collided with the
patrol team's vehicle. The collision
caused four officers and soldiers to fall into the river. The Captain was
unfortunately injured and his
legs were severed. Tra On district police
are currently consolidating documents to  Handle the case
according to the provisions of law. The call for
support for Great Commissar Tran Hoang Ngoi started from
November 27 to December 7
to encourage him to quickly overcome
this difficult period. Bac Leu Tuy has no  land border

human trafficking situation is still quite complicated.
Sadly, most of the

abroad are Vietnamese people
with tricks.  It's about introducing high-paying light jobs
or matchmaking to marry

young people, have become
victims. More than 2 months have passed.
These men still haven't finished

Deceive me to sell my guy again to another

Bac Lieu province police have fought to

Chi is already a female leader for dozens of

Hai Chau district police, Da Nang city,
said they had prosecuted the defendant and

Just before that, at about 8:30 p.m. on November 6, the
Da Nang City Police Command Information Center announced that there were
more than 20 motorbikes with more than 40
teenagers on Bach Dang street, setting up a
trap.  The sirens were
clattering, causing a loss of security and order.
Receiving the news, the
Hai Chau District Police working group quickly arrived and
deployed a blocking force. When they reached
Nhu Nguyet Street, Thuan Phuoc Ward, Hai
Chau District, the subjects continued.  continued to cause trouble
and used tear gas to fight back against tea patrol forces,
determined not to let the subjects be
patient thanks to the criminal police team of the

including Nguyen  Thi Kim Chi, also known
as Minh Anh, residing in Son Tra district, is one

on December 1, Thanh Hoa province police
said that the police force checked for
drugs and caught 31 people red-handed
organizing the illegal use of
drugs at Bach Liem karaoke bar,
Ben Suung town, district as follows:
At the scene, the police
confiscated a plastic bag containing the
synthetic drug ketamine and many other
related objects. Rapid test results
showed that 22/31 cases tested
positive for balcony drugs.  The police have also
identified five people who are the leaders of the party.
These are high-ranking people who
often go to Ben Chung town,
Nhu Thanh district to gather and play, buy
drugs at karaoke bars to organize drug use.
Vietnamese crime continues to be investigated by the authorities. The
end of the year, also known as the lunar month,
is often the time when crime activities
tend to increase, with the
most complicated developments being robberies.
continuously in the past few months,
Hanoi city police have struggled to clarify
many
cases. This is an experimental image of the
robbery case that occurred in Tay Tu ward,
Bac Tu Liem district, Hanoi, taking advantage of the night.  In the
dark, two subjects stopped a passerby's car and
used a sharp knife to control them.
Robbed the motorbike, cell phone and
vehicle documents. The two guys, Giang was still very young,
simply thought that if they ran out of money, they would rob him, then he
called out.  After coming back from the robbery, the brothers spent
all their money and even paid for the boarding house until the 2-hectare day to pay for the
boarding house, at that time the suspect
said, "Hey, you're yelling at me to come home closer to
home and not live far away, but it's too cold."
Just walked about 50 meters, then a couple of
people jumped out of the car and shouted for robbery, then
Nam ran away. This is just one of
many Vietnamese crimes involving
teenagers that happened recently.
Late at night on

's Merode Castle
in Shanghai, China.
Several Robot Research and Development companies
will begin mass production of
humanoid robots in 2024.
These robots will be applied in
many fields from  housework to
scientific research
Multi-purpose humanoid robot jr1 has a
shape that simulates the human skeleton, it is 1.65
m tall, weighs 55 kg, has 40 joints on the body and a
walking speed of 5
km/h, robot jr1 can  perform
coordinated operations with humans and will be
applied in the fields of industrial rehabilitation,
housework and
scientific research. There are many joints in the entire
body of the robot that are connected together
to perform  Currently, motion control
is very complex. The combination of artificial intelligence
and a powerful structure will create
very open robotic applications in the
future to help humanoid robots
adapt to complex situations.
More complex, forer intelligence company has

functional modules that can simulate

public plans.  The company will mass produce about 500
to
2 people next year. The
annual Christmas show at
Germany's merode station has opened. This is the 15th year
waiting for this Christmas to bring
visitors year-end holiday joy in a
frame.  The scene is full of romance and
coziness. Visitors can stroll through the
castle park, admire the
brightly lit walls, participate in
traditional fish frying and enjoy some
Christmas dishes.
Visitors coming here can  Temporarily forget the
stress and relax a bit to sing
together, chat, exchange ideas
and emphasize the
commitment Merode Castle was once owned by the
princes of the Merode family for 850 years and
is now inhabited by  a
Belgian aristocratic family in 2000 The castle was
significantly damaged by a large earthquake.
But since 2009 many events along with a
Christmas market have been organized to help
rebuild
this place.  Thien Binh Mountain
in Eastern China admires the brilliant colors
of maple leaves and many
tourists have come to the locality so as not to
miss the opportunity to enjoy
this beauty. Thien Binh Mountain in Suzhou, Jiangsu province
is famous for its 211 m height.  With the scenery of maple leaves
every fall, the natural yellow, orange and
red leaves create a picturesque scene that
makes photographers feel free to work.
I brought a professional camera
and even visited Suzhou to
record.  The pictures of these maple trees are
really beautiful and wonderful. I
especially pay attention to when the stone in the room changes color.
This is the best time to take
photos. This forest has more than 170 maple trees,
some of which were planted during the Ming and  is
more than 400 years old, the beautiful natural scenery
is expected to attract tourists
throughout December. The
hooded penguin blinks its
eyes more than 10,000 times a day and each sleep
lasts only 4 seconds. a group of scientists  Having just
discovered this,
scientists have observed 14
wild penguins on King
George Island in Antarctica in this way.  11 days when
they are in the breeding season, in addition to
using cameras to continuously record, the team of
experts also used sensors to record
brain wave data related to sleep. The
research team discovered that even though Chi Chi
stopped sleeping,  The black robin
still sleeps a total of 11 hours a day.
They can sleep standing up or lying down. The
depth of sleep increases slightly around
noon when the danger from
predators is at its lowest.
Science Team  concluded that this sleeping style
allows them in the nest to protect their eggs
and nestlings from predators.
This study now shows that
hooded penguins rely heavily on
ultra-short sleeps and spend a
total of half  day to sleep Scientists
say that this sleeping style does not seem to have any
harmful effect on their activities
while
